reviews.text: The staff are great. The 2 stars is because of- No disabled access or lift for the elderly. Just stairs. Would also be nice to have more regular trains to encourage train use as at the moment they're every 30 min (and constantly late at that) up till 7pm, then every hour, then after 10pm every 1.5 hrs. You'd think it was a station in the countryside/middle of nowhere, not in a city.
Good area and quite fair train station.
